settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
Gear up for an epic adventure with the Blokees Transformers Galaxy Version 04: Fractured Space-Time! Unbox, assemble, and display iconic characters like Ultra Magnus, Nemesis Prime, Tarn, Snarl, Smokescreen, Scrapper, Hook, and Shockwave.

Each meticulously crafted figure features stunning details and dynamic articulation, offering endless play possibilities. Add an element of surprise to your collection with each box containing a unique figure – will you get a hero or a villain?

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Suprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each Single Suprise Contains:

  • Transformer Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Series Composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one special figure).

settings.block_text: Step into the world of Transformers with our officially licensed figures, each one meticulously designed to capture the iconic details and beloved characters you know and love.

With over 20+ points of articulation, these figures enable dynamic poses and epic battle scenes, showcasing your Transformers in action like never before. The new, wider body construction enhances stability and realism, while the inclusion of diverse weaponry allows for an authentic and thrilling interplay.

Rediscover your favorite Transformers characters with fresh, innovative designs that stay true to the original spirit. These intricately detailed and reasonably priced figures are perfect for collectors looking to add something special to their collection.
Each figure comes with a range of accessories to enhance your collection. The thrill of unboxing is amplified with each figure being a surprise—who will you reveal next?

settings.block_title: Celebrating 40 Years of Transformers with Extra Accessories
settings.block_text: Mark the 40th anniversary of Transformers with this special edition. Each figure not only honors the legacy of the franchise, but also comes with a variety of accessories, allowing for even more detailed and customizable displays.

settings.heading: Transformers Fractured Space-Time - Time is on Your Side!
settings.context: Time is broken, and only the most powerful Autobots and Decepticons can mend it. With Blokees Transformers Galaxy Version 04, you can unleash these legendary figures to save time itself. Each figure offers a unique build experience and dynamic displays, ready to bring your epic battles to life!

10 yrs and above
ABS Environmentally friendly plastic
The package of the single box contains one Blokees Transformers figure. It could randomly be a basic figure or a special figure.

settings.block_text_02: Disguise: Van.Height: 5 meters.Strengths: Strength, courage, loyalty.Weaknesses: Can be a bit hot-headed.Features: He will fight to the bitter end, bringing his enemies down with him.

The probability of receiving each Transformers is marked under each action figure. For example: 1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, 1 is a secret figure.

settings.heading: Dive into the Multiverse: Assemble Your Iconic Transformers Today!
settings.text: Blokees presents a new, thrilling adventure where the past, present, and future collide. Iconic Transformers characters like Ultra Magnus, Nemesis Prime, and Snarl (in both human and dragon forms) await your assembly and display. Each figure boasts meticulous craftsmanship, durable ABS plastic, and dynamic articulation for action-packed poses. The surprise box adds an element of excitement — who will you unbox next? Start your collection today and dive into the multiverse of Fractured Space-Time!

settings.heading: New and Enhanced Elements in Fractured Space-Time
settings.text:
Dive into the chaos of fractured space and time with the Blokees Figures. Each box is a gateway to a new dimension, holding a surprise Transformers ready to join your collection. Will you discover the resilient Ultra Magnus, the menacing Nemesis Prime, or the versatile Snarl in his dual forms? Embrace the thrill of the unknown and start assembling your ultimate team today!
This features superior articulation, a wider body for improved stability, and an array of new accessories for dynamic interplay. These upgrades ensure a more immersive and realistic experience, perfect for both collectors and fans of action-packed storytelling.

But wait, there's a twist – the enigmatic Shockwave, in his dazzling metallic paint version, might just be lurking in one of the boxes!

settings.heading: Blokees Transformers - Fractured Space-Time Adventure
settings.context: Ready to unleash your inner hero?

settings.title: Imagination Master
settings.context: My son spends hours building and playing with the Fractured Space-Time. His creativity and problem-solving skills have noticeably improved. These sets are a fantastic way to keep him engaged and learning!

settings.title: Tough Mom
settings.context: As a mom, I appreciate toys that can withstand rough play. These figures are incredibly durable and have survived countless battles. They’re worth every penny for their longevity alone!

settings.title: Transformers Fan
settings.context: As a lifelong Transformers fan, I’m blown away by the detail and quality of these figures. They’re more than just toys—they’re collectible masterpieces. A must-have for any serious collector.

settings.title: Safety First Dad
settings.context: I’m always concerned about the safety of the toys my kids play with. Knowing these figures are made from non-toxic materials and meeting all safety standards gives me peace of mind. Plus, my kids love them!

settings.title: Mystery Lover
settings.context: I recently purchased a blind box from the Fractured Space-Time, and the excitement of not knowing which figure I’d get was thrilling! The anticipation and surprise were worth every penny. I ended up with a rare character, and it made my day. These blind boxes are a fantastic addition to any collection and keep the excitement alive.

settings.title: Pose Master
settings.context: With over 20+ points of articulation, these figures allow for dynamic poses and imaginative play. My kids love recreating epic battle scenes and coming up with new adventures.

settings.title: Family Fun
settings.context: We bought these sets for our family game night, and everyone had a blast! From my youngest to my oldest, everyone enjoyed building and playing together. It’s a great way to spend quality time as a family.

settings.title: Anniversary Collector
settings.context: The 40th anniversary edition figures are incredible! They pay perfect homage to the Transformers legacy. I’m thrilled to add them to my collection.

settings.title: Builder Dad
settings.context: The 41-53 pieces in each set offer endless building possibilities. My kids constantly come up with new characters and vehicles. It’s amazing to see their imaginations at work.

settings.title: Gift Lover
settings.context: I gave these to my nephew for his birthday, and he was over the moon! The figures are high-quality and provide hours of entertainment. It’s the perfect gift for any Transformers fan.

settings.title: Together Mom
settings.context: Building these sets together has brought my family closer. We all enjoy the creative process and the fun that follows. It’s a wonderful way to bond and create lasting memories.

settings.block_title: What makes the surprise figure in Fractured Space-Time special?
settings.block_text: The surprise figure in this series features a dazzling metallic finish with intricate detailing, making it a standout collectible. It’s ultra-rare, with only 1 in every 36 boxes produced containing this gem. Ready to embark on your hunt?

settings.block_title: Are Fractured Space-Time figures durable enough for rough play?
settings.block_text: Absolutely! Fractured Space-Time figures are made from high-quality ABS plastic, designed to withstand all kinds of adventures. They’re built tough for endless action-packed fun!

settings.block_title: Can Fractured Space-Time transform into vehicles?
settings.block_text: No, these model kits are all about dynamic building and creativity. While they don’t transform into vehicles, they inspire imaginative play with their versatile design and endless possibilities.

settings.block_title: What material are Fractured Space-Time figures made of, and are they safe?
settings.block_text: Our figures are crafted from premium ABS plastic, rigorously tested to meet EU CE, EU RoHS, and Swiss SGS standards. They’re safe, durable, and environmentally friendly, perfect for kids and collectors alike.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for the Fractured Space-Time?
settings.block_text: These sets are ideal for kids aged 10 and up. They offer a fun and creative challenge that’s perfect for developing minds, making them great for a wide range of ages.

settings.block_title: How do I assemble Fractured Space-Time figures?
settings.block_text: Assembling these figures is easy and fun! Just snap the pre-cut ABS pieces together following the simple instructions provided. No need for glue or special tools. Quick, straightforward, and enjoyable!

With endless creativity, durable design, and detailed craftsmanship, the Fractured Space-Time offers a unique and engaging play experience. Whether you're building epic scenes or collecting rare figures, there's something for everyone!

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
